tweet_text: @professor_dave @CBeebiesHQ It’s logical when you visualize how you rearrange the say 5 odd numbers (=25) such that you add and subtract from the other numbers. There are some beautiful patterns in numbers. Wonderful area to explore with kids such as Fibonacci and Phi.

tweet_text: Good Directors respect their crew, good Directors have a mutual respect for their Producers. Good Directors do not expect everyone around them to die in a ditch to enact their vision. Good Directors are excellent creative problem solvers and team players.
